channel.title: Capsicum Chinense on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Capsicum Chinense on funPlantGenes

item.title: CcLOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA00g77830 Gene Symbol: CcLOL1 Gene Name: LSD ONE LIKE1 Genome: Species: Capsicum chinense Functional Descriptions: CcLOL1, CaGLK2 and CcAPRR2 are highly diverged and are associated with immature fruit color variation in C.

item.title: MYB31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MYB31 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Cap1 Genome: Species: Capsicum chinense Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the MYB transcription factor MYB31 determine the evolution of extremely pungent peppers.
